scripts.start: yarn build-celeste && monk load celeste/celeste-backend.yaml && monk update celeste/stack
scripts.start-local: yarn build-celeste && monk load celeste/celeste-backend.yaml && monk update celeste/stack-local
scripts.build-celeste: node scripts/env.js --inyml celeste/celeste-backend_template.yaml  --outyml celeste/celeste-backend.yaml backend backend-local
